data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pérez-Bañón, Celeste, Radenković, Snezana, Vujić, Ante, Ståhls, Gunilla, Rojo, Santos, Grković, Ana, Petanidou, Theodora (2016): Brachyopa minima (Diptera: Syrphidae), a new species from Greece with notes on the biodiversity and conservation of the genus Brachyopa Meigen in the Northern Aegean Islands. Zootaxa 4072 (2): 217-234, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4072.2.5
